name: docsify-darklight-theme
description: Powers docsify with dark and light mode with switch

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:js: rollup docs/js/index.js -o dist/index.min.js && rollup docs/js/index.js -o docs/js/index.min.js --config rollup.config.js
scripts.build:css: postcss docs/css/style.css -o dist/style.min.css && postcss docs/css/style.css -o docs/css/style.min.css --config postcss.config.js

author: Boopathi Kumar <boopathikumar018@gmail.com>
